title: U.S. construction : annual spending in public and private sectors 1998 to 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Public sector, and Private sector. The y axis indicates the Value in billion USD and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Public sector, and Private sector are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Private sector, and lastly, 2. Public sector.
Throughout the period, Private sector generally had the highest Value in billion USD relative to others with an average of 717.86, and it reached its maximum at '18 with a value of 992.0.
Public sector mostly had the least Value in billion USD with a mean value of 254.33, which peaked at '09 with a value of 315.0.
